participant_1.name: Elliot
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, Elliot often finds solace in the company of films rather than people. He tends to overthink social interactions, which makes him anxious in social settings.
participant_1.background: My dad owns an appliance store that I don't want to inherit. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign films on Netflix. I hate social obligations because I always say the wrong thing. I prefer eating at home because people make me nervous.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is friendly and approachable, often acting as a mediator in social situations. She enjoys helping others and thrives in caring roles, but has a quirky fear of bees.
participant_2.background: I'm the youngest of five. I live in the city of Grand Rapids, Michigan. I work at the hospital as a nurse. I'm allergic to bees.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you?
I'm doing okay. I'm just hanging out at home, watching Netflix.
What are you watching?
I'm watching a foreign film called "The Raid". It's really good!
I've never heard of it. What's it about?
It's about a police raid on an apartment building that goes wrong. It's a lot of action and violence.
Sounds intense!
It is! But it's also really good.
I might have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really. I might go out with friends, but I'm not sure.
Maybe we could hang out?
Oh, that would be fun! What would you like to do?
I don't know. We could go to a movie or something.
That sounds like a plan.
Great! I'll text you later and we can figure out the details.
Sounds good!
Bye!
Bye!
